nodes.text: The Kaas City military police was a law enforcement agency under the Sphere of Laws and Justice that was responsible for maintaining order in Kaas City, the government center of the Sith Empire's capital planet, Dromund Kaas. The police assisted the Dark Honor Guard in putting down the Kaas City protests. Doctor Eckard Lokin supposedly worked for the military police at some point as a Science and Medical Advisor.
